project.name: J-C459A-LUCE-05-ST01-DT01-DF06-CF14-01
project.description: This test takes in an integer n. It creates n temporary files, and fills them with data. It then attempts to clean up, deleting the last 50 of the temporary files, leaving any files created before those in the temp directory.

iopair.name: J-C459A-LUCE-05-ST01-DT01-DF06-CF14-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining size value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C459A-LUCE-05-ST01-DT01-DF06-CF14-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: search files using fuzzy searching Environment variable defining size value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: if [[ $(find /tmp -maxdepth 1 -iname "stonesoup_data_459*" | wc -l) -gt 0 ]]; then echo "TEMP FILES EXIST"; else echo "EMPTY"; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_E1ta2EoYyDUwZLWeKtLw AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_4hK7I2O5lm) AND NOT timeout_xSjmWGuRVH) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_4hK7I2O5lm) OR timeout_xSjmWGuRVH)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_4hK7I2O5lm) AND NOT timeout_xSjmWGuRVH) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_4hK7I2O5lm) OR timeout_xSjmWGuRVH))
